questions.question: What is the dominant color of the product packaging?
What is the primary textual label prominently displayed on the product?
What is the shape of the spray bottle container itself?
What is the color of the spray bottle's cap?
What material seems to compose the spray bottle container?
What type of product is explicitly indicated on the packaging?
What is the stated purpose of this product, as visibly indicated on the box?
What is the active ingredient name prominently mentioned on the packaging?
What is the indicated application area for the product, as visibly marked?
What is the approximate quantity of sprays indicated on the packaging?
What is the brand name visibly printed on the packaging?
What is the text suggesting a comparison to another product?
What is the size of the product container in fluid ounces, as indicated?
What adjective describes the intended effect on pleasure?
What is the general form factor of the entire product?
